name: Pillar
headline: A white-label care enablement platform
description: Pillar is a white-label care enablement solution transforming how organizations scale engagement with their resources. Our mobile-friendly experience centralizes access to their suite of healthcare services, digital benefits and educational programming, while surfacing the right resource at the right time using automated navigation workflows. Pillar’s platform simultaneously captures engagement, satisfaction and utilization data, enabling our partners to maximize the value of their resources and improve operational efficiency. For organizations seeking human-led engagement, Pillar offers staffing and placement solutions from our leading workforce of over 1,000 vetted health coaching providers.

founders.name: Jasmine Mansouri, Founder
founders.description: Jasmine is the Founder & Co-CEO of Pillar, a white-label care enablement platform for healthcare. Prior to Pillar, she established and led the Strategy team at Forge (NYSE:FRGE) scaling the company to become the leading global private securities marketplace.

founders.name: Caroline Early, Founder
founders.description: Caroline is the Founder & Co-CEO of Pillar, a white-label care enablement platform for healthcare. Prior to Pillar, she operated as #2 at L. (YC S15), a consumer women’s health company acquired by Procter & Gamble in 2019.

generated_description:
Pillar is an innovative white-label care enablement platform launched in 2020 and is part of Y Combinator's S21 batch. Based in Austin, TX, Pillar aims to reshape how organizations engage with healthcare resources. With a compact team of just five employees, they are already making waves in the consumer health services and digital health sectors.

The platform centralizes access to a comprehensive suite of healthcare services, digital benefits, and educational resources. It cleverly utilizes automated navigation workflows to ensure that users find the right resource when they need it. This functionality helps organizations enhance engagement, capture utilization data, and improve operational efficiency. Think of Pillar as both a user-friendly interface for patients and a powerful data collection tool for healthcare organizations.

For those organizations wanting a more personalized touch, Pillar offers staffing solutions with a network of over 1,000 vetted health coaching providers. This setup allows companies to scale their care management initiatives effectively. Their goal is clear: to enhance health literacy globally and motivate individuals to make informed health decisions.

If you're curious about what Pillar can do, you can explore their services, schedule a demo, or just learn more at their website: [withpillar.com](https://withpillar.com). Whether you're a healthcare provider or an employer, Pillar stands ready to improve the user experience with a streamlined, data-driven approach that modern health care demands.
